cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.offloading

Class BackendStateData

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.offloading.BackendStateData

  • public class BackendStateData
extends java.lang.Object
    Application-level component responsible for storing and management of backend state data. It is able to pull and push data from/to backends as well as performing moving of state data from one backend to another.

    --------------------------- Created by Jakub Kinst 2015 E-mail: jakub@kinst.cz

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String mBackendId
      Backend ID (of the backend this state data corresponds to)

      Backend Interface (of the backend this state data corresponds to)
      private StateBundle mData
      Actual holder of the state data
      private boolean mMovingInProgress
      Flag for state data moving in progress
      private OffloadingManager mOffloadingManager
      Reference to OffloadingManager instance
